artist: Artist: Douglas Padilla; Artist: Packaged by Alexa Horochowski
creditline: Gift of the Weiser Family Foundation
description: packaged rectangular "collage" on corrugated cardboard; pink ground with black and white smears; black border with blue lines and green circles; packaged in plastic bag with cardboard hanging label stapled to top
dimension: 8 1/4 x 5 5/8 x 1/8 in. (20.96 x 14.29 x 0.32 cm) (including package)
signed: on back, in black: [Padilla / 2001 (on top of a pink pepper and a pink skull)]
title: Abstract Expressionism, from Trinket Carro/Chuchería Cart
